category.name: Business Modeler
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IdentifierLengthPref
preference.preference_description: Restricts the maximum length of the ID Context Name in the object_str property of an identifier. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. Must be a positive integer. The maximum value is 240. (The maximum length of the ID Context Name is 32 characters.)
